com.bukola

Class TotalTaxCalculation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bukola.TotalTaxCalculation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Taxable

    public class TotalTaxCalculation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Taxable
    Class for computing weekly total tax. (Class 2 & 4 National Insurance and 20% income tax)

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • TotalTaxCalculation

        public TotalTaxCalculation(java.math.BigDecimal personalAllowance,
                           java.math.BigDecimal ni4LowThreshold,
                           java.math.BigDecimal ni4HighThreshold,
                           java.math.BigDecimal ni2Threshold,
                           java.math.BigDecimal ni2Rate)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        personalAllowance - this is the personal allowance entered for IncomeTax calculations
        ni4LowThreshold - this is the minimum value for class 4 NI deductions
        ni4HighThreshold - this is the maximum value entered for class 4 NI deductions
        ni2Threshold - this is the minimum value before class 2 NI becomes payable
        ni2Rate - this is the annual weekly rate for National Insurance2
        See Also:
        IncomeTax.getPersonalTaxAllowance(), NationalInsurance4.getLowThreshold(), NationalInsurance4.getHighThreshold(), NationalInsurance2.getNi2Threshold(), NationalInsurance2.getWeeklyRate()

      • getTotalToDate

        public java.math.BigDecimal getTotalToDate()
        Returns a running total of annual tax payable till date. This can be used to compute the total annual tax after 52 weeks, using the tax calendar.
        Specified by:
